report.name: selection_criteria

reportHtmlEscapes.beforeReportHtmlEscape: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"> <html dir=&Direction> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=&Encoding"> </head> <body bgcolor="#ffffff">

dataSource.name: Q_list_criteria_values
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id lv_selbyid, a.record_type_code lv_rectypecode, a.include_exclude_ind lv_incexcl, b.value_seq lv_seq, b.value lv_value, c.identifier_label lv_label, d.record_type_descr lv_record_descr from navdb_select_criteria a, selection_criteria_value b, record_identifier c, record_type d where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.geo_area_id = -2 and a.select_by_id = b.select_by_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.record_type_code = d.record_type_code and b.value_descr = c.identifier_column_name order by 1, 2, 3

dataSource.name: Q_general_criteria
dataSource.select: select a.criteria_id gen_criteria_id, b.criteria_descr gen_criteria_descr from navdb_general_criteria a, general_criteria b where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.apply_ind = 'X' -- Just to make this query get nothing order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_default_criteria
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id, a.record_type_code, a.criteria_id, a.include_exclude_ind, b.criteria_descr, c.record_type_descr from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and geo_area_id = -1 and parent_select_by_id is null and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_default_crit_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id dcc_sel_by_id, a.record_type_code dcc_rec_type_code, a.criteria_id dcc_crit_id, a.include_exclude_ind dcc_inc_excl_ind, b.criteria_descr dcc_crit_desc, c.record_type_descr dcc_rec_type_descr, a.parent_select_by_id dcc_parent_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and geo_area_id = -1 and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.include_exclude_ind in ('I','X') order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_dcc_value
dataSource.select: select select_by_id dccv_sel_by_id, value_descr dccv_value_descr, value dccv_value from selection_criteria_value order by value_seq

dataSource.name: Q_supplemental
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id sup_selbyid, a.record_type_code sup_rtc, a.criteria_id sup_criteria_id, decode(a.include_exclude_ind, 'I','Include',null) sup_incexci, b.criteria_descr sup_criteria_descr, c.record_type_descr sup_rec_descr from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.criteria_id in (select criteria_id from select_criteria where criteria_descr like '%SUPPL%') and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.geo_area_id = -1 order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_geo_area
dataSource.select: select select_by_id g_selbyid, geo_area_name g_geo_aria_name, include_exclude_ind g_incexcl from select_by_geographic_area where navdb_id = :p_navdbid order by 1

dataSource.name: Q_geo_points
dataSource.select: select select_by_id geop_selbyid, sequence_number geop_seqn, latitude , longitude from geographic_area_point order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_geo_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id gc_select_by_id, a.record_type_code gc_record_type_code, a.criteria_id gc_criteria_id, a.include_exclude_ind gc_incexcl, b.criteria_descr gc_criteria_desc, c.record_type_descr gc_record_type_descr, a.geo_area_id gc_geo_area_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.parent_select_by_id is null and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_geo_grand_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id gcc_sel_by_id, a.record_type_code gcc_rec_type_code, a.criteria_id gcc_crit_id, a.include_exclude_ind gcc_inc_excl_ind, b.criteria_descr gcc_crit_desc, c.record_type_descr gcc_rec_type_descr, a.parent_select_by_id gcc_parent_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.include_exclude_ind in ('I','X') order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_geo_grand_children_value
dataSource.select: select select_by_id gccv_sel_by_id, value_descr gccv_value_descr, value gccv_value from selection_criteria_value order by value_seq

dataSource.name: Q_area_code
dataSource.select: select select_by_id ac_selbyid, area_code ac_area_code, include_exclude_ind ac_incexcl from select_by_area where navdb_id = :p_navdbid order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_area_code_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id acc_select_by_id, a.record_type_code acc_record_type_code, a.criteria_id acc_criteria_id, a.include_exclude_ind acc_incexcl, b.criteria_descr acc_criteria_desc, c.record_type_descr acc_record_type_descr, a.area_code_id acc_area_code_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.parent_select_by_id is null and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_area_code_grand_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id accc_sel_by_id, a.record_type_code accc_rec_type_code, a.criteria_id accc_crit_id, a.include_exclude_ind accc_inc_excl_ind, b.criteria_descr accc_crit_desc, c.record_type_descr accc_rec_type_descr, a.parent_select_by_id accc_parent_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.include_exclude_ind in ('I','X') order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_area_code_value
dataSource.select: select select_by_id acccv_sel_by_id, value_descr acccv_value_descr, value acccv_value from selection_criteria_value order by value_seq

dataSource.name: Q_icao
dataSource.select: select select_by_id ic_selbyid, icao_code ic_icao_code, include_exclude_ind ic_incexcl from select_by_icao where navdb_id = :p_navdbid order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_icao_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id icc_select_by_id, a.record_type_code icc_record_type_code, a.criteria_id icc_criteria_id, a.include_exclude_ind icc_incexcl, b.criteria_descr icc_criteria_desc, c.record_type_descr icc_record_type_descr, a.icao_code_id icc_icao_code_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.parent_select_by_id is null and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_icao_grand_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id iccc_sel_by_id, a.record_type_code iccc_rec_type_code, a.criteria_id iccc_crit_id, a.include_exclude_ind iccc_inc_excl_ind, b.criteria_descr iccc_crit_desc, c.record_type_descr iccc_rec_type_descr, a.parent_select_by_id iccc_parent_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.include_exclude_ind in ('I','X') order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_icao_value
dataSource.select: select select_by_id icccv_sel_by_id, value_descr icccv_value_descr, value icccv_value from selection_criteria_value order by value_seq

dataSource.name: Q_arpt_grp
dataSource.select: select select_by_id ag_selbyid, group_name ag_group_name, include_exclude_ind ag_incexcl from select_by_airport_group where navdb_id = :p_navdbid order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_arpt_grp_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id agc_select_by_id, a.record_type_code agc_record_type_code, a.criteria_id agc_criteria_id, a.include_exclude_ind agc_incexcl, b.criteria_descr agc_criteria_desc, c.record_type_descr agc_record_type_descr, a.airport_group_id agc_airport_group_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.parent_select_by_id is null and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_arpt_grp_grand_children
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id agcc_sel_by_id, a.record_type_code agcc_rec_type_code, a.criteria_id agcc_crit_id, a.include_exclude_ind agcc_inc_excl_ind, b.criteria_descr agcc_crit_desc, c.record_type_descr agcc_rec_type_descr, a.parent_select_by_id agcc_parent_id from navdb_select_criteria a, select_criteria b, record_type c where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.criteria_id = b.criteria_id and a.record_type_code = c.record_type_code and a.include_exclude_ind in ('I','X') order by 2

dataSource.name: Q_arpt_grp_value
dataSource.select: select select_by_id agccv_sel_by_id, value_descr agccv_value_descr, value agccv_value from selection_criteria_value order by value_seq

dataSource.name: Q_airport_groups
dataSource.select: select a.select_by_id al_selbyid, a.navdb_id al_navdbid, a.group_name, b.airport_ident al_airport_ident, b.airport_icao al_airport_icao from select_by_airport_group a, airport_to_select b where a.navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.select_by_id = b.select_by_id order by 3, 4, 5

dataSource.name: Q_airport_data
dataSource.select: select airport_ident, airport_icao, ata_iata_designator, airport_name, 'Std' type from pl_std_airport a, navdb b where processing_cycle = :p_cycle and navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.data_supplier = b.data_supplier union select airport_ident, airport_icao, ata_iata_designator, airport_name, 'Tld' type from pl_tld_airport a, navdb b where processing_cycle = :p_cycle and customer_ident = :p_navdbid and navdb_id = :p_navdbid and a.data_supplier = b.data_supplier

dataSource.name: Q_aif_rwy_limit
dataSource.select: select nvl(to_char(aif_rwy_length_limit),'None Selected') aif_rwy_length_limit from navdb where navdb_id = :p_navdbid

dataSource.name: Q_rnp
dataSource.select: select nvl(to_char(rnp),'None Selected') rnp from navdb where navdb_id = :p_navdbid
